last_episode_to_air.name: The Balance of Power
last_episode_to_air.overview: In a final battle against the ultimate enemy, Niko goes on a journey to discover his true purpose.

name: Niko and the Sword of Light
original_name: Niko and the Sword of Light
overview: A plague of shadows has swept across the land, turning innocent creatures into terrible monsters. One champion remains to battle the darkness and return the world to the light: Niko. Armed with his magic sword and guided by a determined Princess, young Niko journeys to the Curse-ed Volcano to face the evil sorcerer Nar Est and free his people from their magic prison.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A plague of shadows has swept across the land, turning innocent creatures into terrible monsters.  One champion remains to battle the darkness and return the world to the light: Niko.  Armed with his magic sword, and guided by a determined Princess, young Niko journeys to the Curse-ed Volcano to face the evil sorcerer Nar Est and free his people from their magic prison.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Chapter Two: The Amulet of Power. Niko's world has been restored, but a new dark power looms in the shadows, waiting for a chance to strike. Only the fabled Amulet of Power can restore the balance between Light and Dark. Niko and his friends must race against the forces of darkness to protect this mysterious relic, an artifact that may hold clues to Nikoâ€™s very existence.

episodes.name: From the Temple of Champions to the Bridge of Doom
episodes.overview: Mandok accidentally releases Niko from a magical chrysalis. Instead of a fully-grown Champion of Carondolet, ghostly princess Lyra finds a ten year old boy. Lyra must lead NIko across the Bridge of Doom, but when the horrible Xerxes returns and attacks, Lyra has no choice but to put her faith in untested Niko.

episodes.name: From the Sky Maze of Anguish to the Swamp of Sorrow
episodes.overview: Lyra must guide Niko, Mandok and Flicker through a deadly sky maze, past the fearsome Arachtaur, as a vicious three-headed monster stalks the team. When the quest almost fails, Lyra makes a tremendous sacrifice.

episodes.name: From the Swamp to Sorrow to the Hills of Humiliation
episodes.overview: Niko's team reaches Carapace, the perfect hiding spot, only to discover the voracious Mugwhump In its place. Chompsky, Carapace's last citizen, helps Niko and Lyra face this bloated menace, and discover a better goal than hiding.

episodes.name: From the Phantom Woods to the Mountains of Misery
episodes.overview: The Hill Giants send Niko and Lyra into the Shoodakooda Wood, where their greatest regrets become real. With the help of Niko and his Sword, Lyra puts her past behind her. Meanwhile, Mandok is captured by an enemy.

episodes.name: From the Sea of Suffering to the Faraway Shore
episodes.overview: Niko and Lyra are received by the Shrimp King, only to learn the Shrimpfolk are about to engage in a futile battle with the ferocious Mantigore to finally free the captured Dolphin Queen. Mandok forms an uneasy alliance.

episodes.name: From the Tumbledowns to the Gap of Gloom
episodes.overview: Niko, Lyra and Mandok help the Tumblebees fend off the terrible Prickletwister that has been terrorizing the town, and join forces with a mysterious traveler.

episodes.name: From the Endless Expanse to the Thorns of Tribulation
episodes.overview: Niko's new sidekick leads the team through the Endless Expanse, as Nar Est's agent tries to stop them at every turn. When the enemy reveals himself, Niko must defeat a threat from within, without his Sword.

episodes.name: From the Cliffs of Catastrophe to the Pools of Destiny
episodes.overview: Coming close to the Pools of Destiny, Niko and Lyra find another human - Aura, a champion who was left behind. But it's Niko who's left behind when Lyra and Aura set off to finish the quest without him.

episodes.name: From the Shattering Springs to the Clouds of Chaos
episodes.overview: Niko, Lyra and Mandok land on a Cloud Clipper belonging to the notorious Captain Nimbeard of the Sky Pirates. They're about to be thrown overboard, but when Nar Est sends a deadly sky monster after them, it's all hands on deck.

episodes.name: From the Peaks of Peril to the Mounds of Mania
episodes.overview: While descending the Peaks of Peril, a protocol gaffe turns the normally proper Umlauti against our heroes. To earn his freedom, Niko must compete against Jackal in a challenging, gladiatorial-style race.

episodes.name: From the Tunnels of Terror to the Den of Doom
episodes.overview: When a swarm of Exuber-Ants chase the team and Lyra is bitten. Niko and Mandok must retrieve a powerful suit of armor hidden deep underground from the ferocious Diggantus.

episodes.name: From the Cursed Volcano to the End of Hope
episodes.overview: Niko and Lyra face Nar Est on his home turf, but Niko's final showdown doesn't go as smoothly as planned.

episodes.name: From the Depths of Despair...
episodes.overview: Niko leads the Army of the Light in a freewheeling final battle and discovers the true power behind Nar Est.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A plague of shadows has swept across the land, turning innocent creatures into terrible monsters.  One champion remains to battle the darkness and return the world to the light: Niko.  Armed with his magic sword, and guided by a determined Princess, young Niko journeys to the Curse-ed Volcano to face the evil sorcerer Nar Est and free his people from their magic prison.

episodes.name: A Day in Carondolet
episodes.overview: As Queen Lyra's birthday celebration begins, Niko suspects that a strange bug might be an agent of darkness.

episodes.name: A Night in Carondolet
episodes.overview: A message from The Darkness prompts Niko and his friends on a new journey to find an ancient relic.

episodes.name: The Forest of Fangs
episodes.overview: Niko and his friends search for an ancient lorekeeper to learn more about the Amulet of Power.

episodes.name: Sky Whale City
episodes.overview: Our heroes search for an ancient map piece in a wondrous city perched atop a flying whale.

episodes.name: The Thorn of Contention
episodes.overview: Following a rough storm, our heroes find themselves between two races locked in a fight for a mysterious tower.

episodes.name: The Caterpillar Train
episodes.overview: To evade a powerful new foe, our heroes hop aboard the Caterpillar Train, a bizarre mode of public transportation.

episodes.name: The Vast Sea
episodes.overview: Our heroesâ€™ journey takes them to an undersea cavern where they encounter a colorful annual festival.

episodes.name: The Automatron
episodes.overview: The team searches inside a living machine for the final item in their quest.

episodes.name: The Forgotten Fortress
episodes.overview: Inside an ancient enchanted fortress, Niko and his friends race to find the Amulet of Power before Nar Est.

episodes.name: The Balance of Power
episodes.overview: In a final battle against the ultimate enemy, Niko goes on a journey to discover his true purpose.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Chapter Two: The Amulet of Power. Niko's world has been restored, but a new dark power looms in the shadows, waiting for a chance to strike. Only the fabled Amulet of Power can restore the balance between Light and Dark. Niko and his friends must race against the forces of darkness to protect this mysterious relic, an artifact that may hold clues to Nikoâ€™s very existence.
